data.current_summary: Filter the stopping words from the provided input data or links
data.summary_suggestion: Remove stopwords from text data or URLs
data.description_suggestion: Removes common stopwords (filtering words) from provided text data or URLs based on the specified language type. Accepts either raw text content or URLs as input via the ExudeBean schema. Returns processed text with stopwords removed. Supports multiple language types through the {type} path parameter. No data persistence occurs - results are returned in the response only.

data.current_summary: Filter the stopping words from the provided input file
data.description_suggestion: Removes common stopwords (filtering words) from text content within an uploaded file based on the specified language type. Accepts file uploads (text-based formats) as input. Returns processed text with stopwords removed. Supports multiple language types through the {type} path parameter. The original file is not modified - processed results are returned in the response only.
